title: (x) MetroTransit - Rotis Serif, Avenir {Franz, Patricia}
content:
For a little something I'm doing to support the local transit workers, I could use some help identifying the fonts used in the MetroTransit logo.   
   
Thank you, kindly!   
   
 ![MetroTransit](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516143018im_/http:/www.typophile.com/forums/messages/83/32422.gif)
author: kristin

comments.content: And "Transit".. Hm.. [FF Kievit](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516143018/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/kievit/book/testdrive.html?s=Transit&p=48), slightly stretched & shortened minuscules?

Transit could be Avenir light, kerned really tight.   
   
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/avenir/35-light/testdrive.html?s=Transit&p=48](http://web.archive.org/web/20050516143018/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/avenir/35-light/testdrive.html?s=Transit&p=48)

Thank you Franz and Patricia. Here's my first attempt:
